about_the_game:
Continue your Borderlands 3 adventure with the Season Pass!

This content is included with purchase of the Borderlands 3 Super Deluxe Edition, Borderlands 3 Ultimate Edition, and Borderlands 3 Collector's Edition.

The Season Pass includes:

  • Moxxi’s Heist of the Handsome Jackpot campaign add-on.
  • Guns, Love, and Tentacles campaign add-on.
  • Bounty of Blood campaign add-on.
  • Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck campaign add-on.
  • All 4 Multiverse Final Form Cosmetic Packs.
  • A Butt Stallion weapon skin, weapon trinket and grenade mod.

DLC 1: Moxxi’s Heist of the Handsome Jackpot is available now.


Are you ready for the biggest score of your loot-hunting career? Moxxi has just the job for you: a good old-fashioned heist. She's looking to take control of a space station casino called The Handsome Jackpot. Should you succeed, a safe loaded with loot awaits! There's just one small problem: the casino houses an army of Hyperion security forces and crazed casino-goers. Will luck be on your side?

DLC 2: Guns, Love, and Tentacles


Hammerlock and Wainwright's engagement party has been interrupted by deranged occultists. Reunite with old friends and team up with eerie new characters to help true love triumph over eldritch horror.

DLC 3: Bounty of Blood


You've come to the brutal frontier planet of Gehenna in hopes of collecting a bounty on The Devil Riders, a violent gang of beast-riding mercenaries. Team up with tough-as-hell locals to protect and rebuild the town of Vestige. Then take the fight to The Devil Riders using new interactive objects and the added Jetbeast mount in this gritty tale told by an unseen narrator.

DLC 4: Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck


Explore the chaotic mind of Krieg to search for clues leading to Vaulthalla. Help Krieg process his traumatic memories by blasting his inner demons to bits while trying not to succumb to lunacy.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (latest service pack)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 or Intel i5-3570
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7970 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 75 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 (Intel i7-4770)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
